name: this game is not a school project.
name_original: this game is not a school project.
description:
Made in collaboration with N.S. Dawn, the long-awaited next installment in the This Game is Not series is finally here!

Game plays in fullscreen on launch.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Wall climb by jumping while pressing up against a wall.

You can view the code behind this project at https://github.com/ryomams/FloomieSpoopie.

This game was made for Angus Forbes' Fall 2020 CMPM35 at UCSC. You can view our other projects for this class at https://ryoma.ms/CMPM35.
